mapper.select: select count(*) from requestdetails INNER JOIN hospital on rd_dln=hdln and rd_address=haddress where rd_state = 1 and hname like '%'|| #{searchBar} ||'%' and to_char(rd_applicationdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{sdate} and #{edate}
mapper.update: update requestdetails set rd_state = 0 where rd_dln = #{dln}
mapper.select: select rd_dln, rd_address, rd_coun_date, rd_content from requestdetails where rd_dln = #{dln}

select * from ( select rd_title, rd_applicationdate, rd_coun_date, hname from requestdetails INNER JOIN hospital on rd_dln=hdln and rd_address=haddress where rd_state = 1 order by rd_applicationdate desc )where rownum <=5
